name: Intensive Hydrating Cream
description: A daily moisturizer infused with a blend of Jeju green tea and green tea seed oil to leave skin feeling quenched with intense hydration.

name: Gentle Face Cleanser
description: Gentle Face Cleanser safely and effectively removes dirt, excess oil, and toxins from your face without harshly stripping your skin dry or leaving it uncomfortably tight. Makes a great post-workout refresher.

name: Natural Mineral Sunscreen Lotion SPF 30
description: An ultra lightweight SPF 30 lotion formulated to be water and sweat resistant. This non-greasy, reef safe formula sinks into the skin effortlessly with no white residue. Hyaluronic Acid and Ashwagandha soothes and moisturizes the skin while Non-Nano Zinc Oxide blocks UVA + UVB rays.

name: Skin Barrier Bootcamp Set
description: A thoughtfully curated routine to help repair, support and strengthen your skin’s barrier for your glowiest skin yet. Perfect for normal to dry skin types.

name: Rescue Acne Trio Pack
description: Botani Rescue Acne Trio is a plant-based vegan certified, 3-step skin regime to help restore clear healthy skin naturally. It features phyto-actives such as Australian Lemon Myrtle, White Willow Bark (natural salicylic acid), and Golden Seal Extract all working together to help nurture and heal.
